text: Piet Meiring is a South African theologian and academic. He is a Dutch Reformed Church in South Africa minister and the former director of the Centre for Public Theology at the University of Pretoria. He served on the Truth and Reconciliation Commission. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Dutch Reformed Church in South Africa Category:South African theologians Category:University of Pretoria faculty Category:TRC South African people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Piet Meiring
